page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: On leaving the area's Primary Schools at the age of 11 the children continue their secondary education at Helston Comprehensive School. The children are taken to and from Helston School by coach paid for by the County Council. For children under school age the area offers a Mother and Toddlers Group at Herland Cross C.P. School and a Playgroup and Mother and Toddlers Group at Sithney C.P. School. All these Groups are run on a voluntary basis with no money from other sources. The area offers little opportunity for Adult Education as the nearest Adult Education Classes are held in either Helston or Camborne.
